file_content.text: Oh-five-hundred hours. I count seven mercenaries on site, all heavily armed--so why am I recording this for you, Neiya?
You see, I won't be able to say goodbye. Once this mission is done, my Master wants me flying to Sleheyron.
So, please listen. Go to Coruscant. Let the Jedi Order train you.
You're not the strongest in the Force. You may never become a Master. But you can do so much good, and if it gets you out of here....
Time for me to go. The Empire is deploying these killers to Klatooinian space soon. Someone has to stop them.
They say "there is no death; there is the Force." Let's hope proof of that can wait.
